footer.1: FIX.TJ is Tajikistan’s premier service platform connecting skilled masters and clients. Find reliable specialists for all your home and business needs.

master.2: Connect with experienced specialists for all your service needs

about.2: Connecting skilled professionals with clients across Tajikistan. We are shaping the future of the service market in Central Asia.
about.4: FIX.TJ is created to bridge the gap between skilled masters and clients in Tajikistan. We believe everyone deserves access to quality services, and every worker deserves a fair opportunity to showcase their skills.
about.5: Our platform empowers masters to build reputation, grow their business and connect with clients who value their skills. For customers, we provide a reliable marketplace to find vetted professionals for any service needs.
about.7: We are committed to providing the best experience to both masters and clients.
about.9: All professionals are verified and vetted for your safety
about.11: Access to hundreds of skilled professionals across Tajikistan
about.15: Round‑the‑clock customer support for any needed help
about.20: Founded in 2023, FIX.TJ began as a small initiative to help local craftsmen connect with clients in Dushanbe. Today we proudly serve communities across all regions of Tajikistan, from Khujand to Kulob and everywhere in between.
about.22: We understand the unique needs of the local market. Our platform is designed to perform seamlessly across all regions, supporting Tajik and Russian languages and considering regional business practices.
about.23: From the bustling markets of Dushanbe to the historic streets of Khujand, FIX.TJ is committed to empowering local talent and fueling economic growth across our beautiful country.
